hasDitaContent.@value: Demeclocycline increases the anticoagulant effect of acenocoumarol. Manufacturer advises monitor INR.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Demeclocycline   increases   the anticoagulant effect of   acenocoumarol .  Manufacturer advises monitor INR .

hasDitaContent.@value: Acitretin increases the risk of benign intracranial hypertension when given with demeclocycline. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Acitretin   increases   the risk of benign intracranial hypertension when given with   demeclocycline .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both demeclocycline and alcohol can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  demeclocycline  and  alcohol  can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both demeclocycline and alectinib can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  demeclocycline  and  alectinib  can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Alitretinoin increases the risk of benign intracranial hypertension when given with demeclocycline. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Alitretinoin   increases   the risk of benign intracranial hypertension when given with   demeclocycline .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Oral antacids greatly decrease the absorption of oral demeclocycline. Manufacturer advises separate administration by 2 to 3 hours.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Oral   antacids   greatly   decrease   the absorption of   oral   demeclocycline .  Manufacturer advises separate administration by 2 to 3 hours .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both demeclocycline and bedaquiline can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  demeclocycline  and  bedaquiline  can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Bismuth greatly decreases the efficacy of demeclocycline. Manufacturer advises separate administration by 2 hours.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Bismuth   greatly   decreases   the efficacy of   demeclocycline .  Manufacturer advises separate administration by 2 hours .
